body_content.explanation: designed to destroy radar systems (= systems that use radio waves to find the position of objects):
examples: The aircraft fired back using anti-radar missiles.
Anti-radar aircraft now deployed in the area include the F-4G Phantoms.

body_content.explanation: designed to avoid being seen by radar systems (= systems that use radio waves to find the position of objects):
examples: He helped to develop an an anti-radar device.
Red mercury has been used as an ingredient in anti-radar paint.
